sentence.idiomatic: This product is not expensive, and is also quite useful.
Although it's been used for a long time, it looks as if it's still pretty new.
This clothing is quite nice looking, where did you buy it?
Recently I applied for a large capacity mail box.
Now a 20 GB capacity MP4 player is also very inexpensive.
The capacity of my hard drive is too low and I don't have enough space.
This computer is always freezing up, you must save frequently.
I forgot to save the thing I finished, how terrible.
Where did you save that data to? How come I can't find it?
It's my custom to download documents onto my own computer to look at.

word.literal: to be tired of listening to

sentence.idiomatic: I'm already so sick of these songs, could you download some new songs?
Right now the downloading speed is very slow. They probably won't be downloaded for another five minutes.
Domestically produced mobile phones appear very fashionable on the outside, but their quality is not too good.
Speaking of color televisions, I still like to buy domestically produced ones. They're a good value.
From a maintenance aspect, domestically produced products are more convenient than imported ones.
Did you buy a new MP3 player? It's pretty nice looking!
I just bought it yesterday. It seems like it's pretty easy to use.
Really? What's the capacity?
3 gigs. I was told that it can hold several hundred songs. It can also be used as a portable hard drive.
Can you listen to podcasts?
Of course. I've already downloaded quite a few. Oh right, you can also listen to the radio.
Not bad. Where is it made?
It's domestic. In the beginning I've looked at quite a few brands. In the end, I felt that this one was the best.
But, I have always felt that the quality of MP3 players is not that good. I also had one before but I've only used it for a few months and it broke.
It was probably because it was a bad brand. A more famous brand shouldn't be like that.
Anyway, I won't buy another one.
